name: MRAK
description:
MRAK - hardcore platformer with unique gameplay. You will not see the level until your character dies at least once and does not paint part of the level.

Main feature
  • Unique gameplay in which the level becomes more visible with each death of the character

    [*Rich atmosphere of darkness created by pleasant effects and sounds

  • Friendly and complex gameplay will delay you with his head and will not release until the passage
